tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am incredibly grateful to Dr. Poornima for her expertise and support during my labor, resulting in a successful and empowering natural birth.
 
Five years ago, my first baby was delivered via C-section in my hometown. From the initial stages, Dr. Poornima encouraged and supported decision to pursue a natural delivery, despite my concerns stemming from my previous C-section experience

Her expertise and compassionate guidance were instrumental in ensuring a successful natural delivery, which was a truly empowering experience. Dr. Poornima's dedication extended beyond delivery, with thorough postpartum care that provided reassurance and support.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Poornima for her exceptional maternal care, unwavering support, and commitment to empowering her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Consulted Dr Poornima at cloudnine oar branch for my pregnancy journey. She was extremely supportive and informative since our first consultation. All throughout pregnancy, she explained relevant progress at the appropriate time and reassured us through each of our concerns. She was very accommodating with all our queries and provided us with a smooth delivery experience. She is very caring and responsive and we are eternally thankful for that.

Definitely recommend consulting her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Poornima Ma'am,

I don't think I'll ever be able to fully express how much you have done for me and my baby. I am so fortunate to have you as my doctor. As my pregnancy journey comes to a joyous end with the arrival of our precious baby, I am filled with immense gratitude and appreciation for the exceptional care and support you provided throughout this remarkable journey.

In the early days of my pregnancy, I had other gynecologists, and I found it extremely frustrating during visits when I felt rushed, confused, uncomfortable, and even left with questions I still needed clarification on. Choosing you as my doctor was the best decision I have ever made. I received completely different care from you. You have always listened to every single question and concern of mine and have given extremely thorough explanations that I actually understood.

From the very beginning, your expertise and genuine passion for your work were evident. Your thoroughness in monitoring the progress of my pregnancy, your attention to detail, and your willingness to address any concerns made me feel confident and well-cared-for at every step. I remember running to Google for every diagnostic result or scan comment and getting panicked; the best advice you gave me was not to Google things but rather to ask you, and believe me, that made my journey peaceful. I know sometimes I was annoying and asked irrelevant questions, but you never lost your calm. That's why I call you my peacemaker ;)

Your approachability around the clock made me feel secure and relaxed; you were always just a ping away for me. The way you explained each thing, be it my food intake, exercise, or even tiny details of my daily routine that needed care, was remarkable.

The day of delivery was nothing short of extraordinary. You were never in a hurry, as you told me in the beginning that I was going to have a normal delivery. Without your encouragement and support in the labor room, it wouldn't have happened. My family and I are incredibly grateful for the safe and healthy delivery of our baby.

Beyond your medical expertise, it was your kindness and genuine interest in our well-being that made this journey truly special. Your commitment to fostering a positive and trusting patient-doctor relationship has left a lasting impression on us. * *** ******** *** *** *** *** **** ****** * **** **** ************ and I am a patient of yours for life.

Thank you, Poornima Ma'am, for being an integral part of this incredible chapter in our lives. Your genuine care has made our pregnancy and delivery experience truly memorable. We feel blessed to have had you as our gynecologist.

*** *** *** ** *** **** ******* ********* *** **** ***** I will HIGHLY recommend you if anyone needs a doctor who listens to their concerns seriously; they will not be disappointed in the care they receive!

With heartfelt gratitude,
Juhi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I chose Cloudnine Hospital for my pregnancy journey without researching doctors. After visiting, I opted for Dr. Poornima. She impressed us with her detailed explanations of fetal positioning during each visit. Dr. Poornima strongly advocated for normal vaginal delivery, which made us feel confident.

Throughout my pregnancy, her unwavering support made me feel strong and fearless. When my amniotic sac broke at 38 weeks, I calmly went to the hospital. Within 8 hours, I delivered via vaginal delivery, supported by Dr. Poornima and her team. It was a positive experience thanks to their guidance and care.***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* who builds trust and makes her patients comfortable. Her presence, words, and effective solutions are incredibly positive. She's not just a doctor to me; she's a great, friendly presence in my life.

I will cherish her forever and ever. With all her support, I have been blessed with a healthy baby boy. I'm so thankful for you, ma'am. Loads of love to you!

I visited the doctor and she gave blood tests. **** *** ****** *** ******* ****** ** **** *** ***** **** ******* I did the blood test in the same hospital. I sent my blood test report to her. She didn't reply to it. Also she told me that she will do some research about my condition and suggest me a counselor. She didn't do any of that. Even the receptionist told she will call to update about the counselor.  Didn't get any call. While going there and consulting I felt good. But the behaviour post consultation was extremely disappointing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Journey of Kavyashree , Baby Hithashree 😊Cloud Nine Old Airport branch is absolutely professional and seamless in getting the appointments and services. For my wife without having any exposure to any doctor's review or word of mouth we just got our first consultation with Dr.Poornima M and we stuck to the same doctor till the delivery not because of any gut feel its purely because of her patient friendly nature engaging the patient in explaining "how important the motherhood and what all efforts it takes to go though the smooth journey plus  the  openness about the delivery procedures"  finally the humbleness we saw from the first meeting itself gave us confidence to stuck till the end. Today we are extremely happy with Mahalakshmi( Baby Girl)  gave birth in our family , Dr.Poornima M is absolute gem in OAR branch she kept motivating my wife with right instructions, follow ups and explained the every step and procedures very detailed way made us very comfortable and felt like one of the family member.since we din't have any exposure to discuss about the maternity we believed Dr. Poornima M as one of the family member and so did the Doctor by responding quickly to our concerns over just a text message.Dr.Poornima M delivered our first baby in absolute normal fashion, From the day 1 she motivated us for normal delivery ,infact she honestly admitted us saying " C-Section would be easy for the doctor to complete the procedure"  however the doctor motivated us till the end for the normal also gave the clarity keeping any complications one should be open to other procedures too. This clarity and detailing i beleive one should be having as it helps during the labor room. As an husband to my wife there were few well informed decisions i had to take during this process and our Doctor explained very clearly the importance of right decision making with logical reasoning behind the decisions to be made during the labor room procedure. It's very natural that most ppl will get panic and go clueless once the patient enters the labor room. Therefore about the decision making being strong but not adamant during the delivery process is extremely important and  I was well educated and informed by the doctor  hence I was very confident and complete calmness was established to go through the pressure situation. The delivery labor room experience itself one can pen down the journey and make it as a short story 😊 as it involved twits and turns , Dr .poornima M consistent motivation towards my wife to get the baby out completely normal without any external additional artificial stuff was the high point in the story. Infact at one point after the 10 cm dilation done my wife almost given up that she couldn't deliver the baby normal she was totally drained out with no energy left which i visibly experienced. I was extremely nervous but kept my complete faith in our doctor , The heroic entry around 3 AM doctor turned to our rescue in the labor room she motivated my wife to give all her energy to push the baby out , but tough luck my wife lost her energy and looked like she couldn't take anymore.Doctor came up with an excellent presence of mind to make her stand 2 feet lil wide open to get advantage of the gravity while again giving deep grunt pushes which worked a bit where baby's hair was visible when doctor again asked my wife to lay down on the bed. What a motivation that time doctor gave i was there witnessing while also i was totally numb but keeping my nerve as I kept saying to myself  "we are with the best doctor out there". After multiple pushes by my wife with the lil support from nurse staff one more deep push plus the doctor's very tiny space cut down resulted us in normal delivery coming out Mahalakshmi(baby girl) to this world :😊Tears automatically came for both of us. Such a great feeling which is unexplainable.The very next day my wife was able to walk naturally and now while i am writing this after 2 weeks of delivery she is back to her original condition.today  both the baby and my wife are doing absolutely  fine. Big Thanks to All the staff who took care of my baby and wife during the entire delivery process. Everything hassle free right from doctor visits ,the food, house keeping ,lactation doctors, nutrition advice , baby care tips, and the vaccine schedule , everything been taken care very systematically and professionally.Also we would like to thank our endocrinology doctor Lakshmi Reddy , she gave the right steps and pointers throughout the pregnancy period to maintain the blood sugar levels and motivated us with right inputs ofcourse she monitored us strictly  and kept suggesting the right techniques to follow.Finally Big Thanks our Doctor Poornima M, what a great human being she is ,always smile on face,very friendly ,jovial made us like one of the family member and took care of us throughout the journey with right inputs.since my wife has special condition of pre diabetic our Doctor planned carefully assessing each and everything and guided us till the end.Due to the diabetic conditions Doctor Poornima M informed us saying " 37 weeks biologically a baby is ready to deliver and in conditions like diabetes we should be very clear, can't take risk keeping the baby inside mother's stomach till the complete pregnancy period ", Doctor told "anytime after 37 weeks delivery is possible and gave us the date between 37 week and 38 week as its important to safeguard both baby and mother ". Exactly same thing happenedPrecisely after 37 weeks we had consultation with our doctor and doctor did initial cervical stripping to induce the labor contractions just naturally , there you go after that in few days i had to admit my wife as she was feeling the contractions throughout the day and her water broke  37 weeks 5 days water broke out I rushed to hospital and finally THE biggest gift of my life happened 😊. Dr Poornima M  you are terrific.Thank you doctor for evrything **** *** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Exercise,Child Birth Education,Gynae Problems,Vaginal Infection Treatment,
review:
I visited Poornima mam for some vaginal infection in initial days, she was so friendly and experienced doctor who made ease in explaining the problem and also my family and friends where satisfied with mam's consultation . As I returned from abroad for my pregnancy in 7th month I visited Poornima mam for consultation she was firstly so happy to see me after a long time and she encouraged and motivated me for normal vaginal delivery explained me about the benefits of it. She was available all the time when I called for any doubts and she explained all the food habits, exercises, breathing techniques to get relief in labour pain .. She provided support to my husband in labour room. she made my big day so simple and painless in welcoming my daughter. 😊😀😊 
Explaining about my post delivery poornima mam visited me regularly and also explained about postpartum phase what all changes happens and how to deal with it .
I would personally and strongly recommend Poornima mam ** *** ** *** **** ************ ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We stumbled upon consulting Dr Poornima few years back without anyone's advice and since then we could feel the warmth and approachability of her. Then last year when I conceived, we were visiting another doctor in Cloudnine OAR but were not satisfied with her consultation. We remembered Dr. Poornima from few years back and visited her again and she was still the same friendly and warm doctor with whom you can ask as many questions without being clobbered, which is usually the case with many other doctors.

From the beginning of my pregnancy, Dr. Poornima motivated me to go for Normal delivery (when initially other doctors scared me that since I had PCOS and am of short height, Normal delivery is not possible for me). She kept guiding me with appropriate diet plan, medicines and exercise routine to prepare myself for Normal delivery. She is so friendly and approchable that she answered many of my doubts and questions over the phone through out my pregnancy so that I can stay at the comfort of my home without worrying.

During the day of my delivery, she visited me at 9 PM and again motivated me that I am doing good and will soon be meeting my baby. I got very tired towards the end and had given up. I asked for C section, but she kept me giving confidence that I can do it. And finally my baby boy was delivered normally. She even prepped my husband during 9 months of pregnancy as to what will happen in the labour room. This set up our expectations and there were no surprises.

Even after delivering my baby boy, she answered many of my postpartum queries over the phone. *** ** *** **** ****** *** *** *** *** *** I am lucky enough to find her for the biggest life event.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant Women Counseling,Bleeding During Pregnancy,
review:
Dr. Poornima is an exceptional gynecologist who provided unwavering support throughout my entire pregnancy journey. Her dedication and commitment to her patients are unparalleled. She went above and beyond to ensure that I felt safe and supported at every stage, always taking the time to address any concerns or questions my partner and I had, no matter how trivial they may have seemed.

What truly sets her apart is, her availability and willingness to assist round the clock. She instilled confidence in me and encouraged a normal delivery, patiently waiting until the very end. Her reassuring presence was a constant source of comfort during what can be an anxious time for expectant parents.

Following the birth of my baby boy, she continued to provide exceptional care, visiting daily and ensuring both my baby's and my own health were closely monitored. Even weeks after delivery, she remained attentive, checking in on my well-being.
I cannot recommend Dr. Poornima highly enough to anyone seeking a supportive and compassionate healthcare provider. Her expertise, kindness, and genuine concern for her patients make her an invaluable asset to any expectant parent. Dr. Poornima truly made my pregnancy journey a positive and memorable experience, and I am forever grateful for her guidance and care.

Nitika

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My name is Indumathi. I worked in cloud nine as a labour room staff nurse from 2015 to 2018. I worked with Dr Poornima during that time as she also recently joined with me give or take a few months. She is a great pleasure to work with. I got a better opportunity in the UK and moved there. I wanted to deliver my baby in cloud nine the moment I was pregnant. While looking up the doctors to get my appointment I saw Dr Poornima, who is now a consultant. I was so happy that I booked her appointment immediately. I told my family about her and they were all waiting to meet her. When I came to Bangalore we visited her as a family and it was a great experience. She was still the same Doctor that I knew who is funny and kind. I wanted a Normal delivery and she was very supportive not only to me but to my family as well and motivated me till the last moment when I was on the labour table. I had a normal delivery finally and she was there by my side throughout. It was a great journey and I loved every bit of it. Me and my whole family are very thankful for bringing us our little bundle of joy safely. She’ll always be in my prayers. Thank you so much ma’am.

Dr. Poornima is an exceptional gynecologist who provided unwavering support throughout my entire pregnancy journey. Her dedication and commitment to her patients are unparalleled. She went above and beyond to ensure that I felt safe and supported at every stage, always taking the time to address any concerns or questions my partner and I had, no matter how trivial they may have seemed.

What truly sets her apart is, her availability and willingness to assist round the clock. She instilled confidence in me and encouraged a normal delivery, patiently waiting until the very end. Dr. Poornima truly made my pregnancy journey a positive and memorable experience, and I am forever grateful for her guidance and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My name is Indumathi. I worked in cloud nine as a labour room staff nurse from 2015 to 2018. I worked with Dr Poornima during that time as she also recently joined with me give or take a few months. She is a great pleasure to work with. I got a better opportunity in the UK and moved there. I wanted to deliver my baby in cloud nine the moment I was pregnant. While looking up the doctors to get my appointment I saw Dr Poornima, who is now a consultant. I was so happy that I booked her appointment immediately. I told my family about her and they were all waiting to meet her. When I came to Bangalore we visited her as a family and it was a great experience. She was still the same Doctor that I knew who is funny and kind. I wanted a Normal delivery and she was very supportive not only to me but to my family as well and motivated me till the last moment when I was on the labour table. I had a normal delivery finally and she was there by my side throughout. It was a great journey and I loved every bit of it. Me and my whole family are very thankful for bringing us our little bundle of joy safely. She’ll always be in my prayers. Thank you so much ma’am.

The doctor was extremely unpleasant to talk to, and I wouldn't recommend her to anyone who has questions about their menstrual cycle. She was rude and dismissive while answering my genuine inquiries. I couldn't understand why her consultation, which cost 1000 bucks, was limited to the number of substantial questions only, as she deemed mine irrelevant and baseless. I eventually expressed my dissatisfaction, explaining that I hadn't visited a gynaecologist regularly and wanted polite explanations to my inquiries. Instead, she criticised my age and lack of planning for a baby, comparing me to a 25-year-old's fertility, lack of decision making, etc. Her manner of discussing age-related factors and conception felt like she blamed me for not getting pregnant within my first year and a half of marriage.

Initially, she didn't mention any issues with my menstrual cycle, but when I started asking questions based on the then going discussions, she abruptly claimed that my lack of conception meant I wasn't ovulating properly and I am unnecessarily contradicting her statements by asking irrelevant questions. I politely explained her that I had some doubts and wanted to clarify them by asking her because she's a doctor, and I believed she could help alleviate any concerns. However, she didn't take it positively. Her rude and harsh tone was unacceptable, *** *** ****** *********** ** *** **** **** *** ***** *** **** ****** ** ********* ** ******** ******* The decision to have a baby or not lies with the spouses. I regret visiting this doctor. I explained that I wasn't from a medical background and needed proper explanations for my questions, but she responded rudely, making me uncertain about what I could ask her. She even angrily wrote the prescription because of a question I asked, which upset her. I hope this message reaches potential patients looking for a better doctor through this app.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted Dr Poornima for my pregnancy journey in cloud 9 OAR. She  clear any doubts ,in person or via message at anytime of the day, be it even the silliest of things  which is very comforting for a first time mom.  Appropriate guidance from her each month with respect to diet plan and  exercises helped me prepare and gain confidence in myself for a vaginal delivery. Two days before my delivery procedures were done by the doctor and was assured that things look good for a vaginal delivery . As expected i was ready in 2 days and delivered a beautiful baby girl through vaginal delivery. Doctor was very supportive and helpful that she personally msgd me the previous night asking if things were ok. Thats the kind of personal attention i received from my OBG. Highly recommend her to everybody looking for a good doctor with whom u can place complete trust in for ur pregnancy and delivery journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Fortunately without any prior idea, I started consulting Dr. Poornima for my second pregnancy. In the first visit itself I felt very comfortable and very positive. She motivated me to go for VBAC and advised throughout the pregnancy. She is very patient and answers all questions even if it’s very basic ones. She is approachable and made me feel super comfortable in both pre and post delivery. Since I could not visit in person for few things post delivery, she was kind enough to advise me over phone. Overall, myself and my husband are very happy with the experience. Not to forget, she is my first daughter’s favourite doctor now😀Thank you ma’am for being the reason for us to have a healthy baby boy 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My journey with Dr. Poornima showcased her outstanding medical skills and compassionate approach. From the initial consultation for a missed miscarriage to the successful delivery of my baby girl, she provided expert medical advice and unwavering emotional support. Dr. Poornima's exceptional care transformed a challenging journey into a positive experience. I am grateful for her guidance and support and highly recommend her to anyone seeking a doctor who truly cares.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks a lot to Dr.Poornima M who supported, guided and encouraged throughout my pregnancy journey. Always friendly in nature and answers all our questions clearly even if it is a silly question. With her support and blessings  I was blessed with a Boy Baby.😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.  Poornima is incredible. Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!

My delivery would have been complicated if it was not  she, she was pushing me for Normal delivery gave me all the positive hopes and prepared me mentally and physically for the same as I didn’t get the natural pain as my due date was nearer went and admitted and got the pain gel induced to get the delivery pain but with her extensive experience with one touch she felt the baby is not in position immediately got the scan done and could find baby was BREACHED just a week back my baby was in position. She was a GOD at that moment saved both of our lives and I have healthy baby boy😊

Thank you doctor and we love you forever😍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started visiting Dr.Poornima from the start of my pregnancy. During the entire 9 months she was very practical, friendly and was always a phone call away whenever needed. She always recommended tests only if they were required. Because of her practical take on every aspect, I had a complication free delivery. Even on the day of delivery, though I had a tough day coping with pains, she guided and advised us so well at every juncture that helped me have a normal vaginal delivery which I always wished. I would recommend her strongly for all the reasons I have specified above

Poornima M , a great doctor and  human being. she will always fill confident in you . She herself has so much enthusiasm in speaking . We feel good to talk such positive attitude people.  I felt very comfort with poornima doctor.  During my delivery,  she was there on time even though it was early morning and took care of each and every small aspects of delivery . I made correct choice of doctor and loud applaud to poornima doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr. Poornima based on our friends recommendation. I must say from the moment we met Doctor, we felt at ease and was rest assured that we and our baby were in safe hands.

Dr. Poornima is one of the most down to earth, friendly and jovial persons one will come across.

Our pregnancy journey and normal delivery felt like a breeze, thanks to Dr’s reassurance and comfort.

She took the time to explain each and every change, kept us informed all through the way and most importantly was patient, supportive and persisted to ensure we had a normal delivery.

Should we decide to have another baby, we know who our go to doctor will be!

All thanks to Dr Poornima.
